idea-plugin.name: GfmA
idea-plugin.description:
Yet another Github Flavored Markdown Preview plugin for intellij platform

Feature

  • Preview markdown as github flavored markdown by
    Github Markdown API.
  • Using embedded Chromium browser (JCef) to display preview.
  • If internet connection is not available,
    it falls back to offline markdown parser instead.
    • You may choose offline parser as default markdown parser.
    • Note that flexmark-java is used as offline markdown parser,
      but not every gfm syntax is parsed with the parser at this time.
      If you want to see precise gfm preview, I recommend to use Github Markdown API parser instead.

Github Markdown API

I recommend to use Github Markdown API if internet connection is
available because it is official gfm syntax provider.

If you enable Github Markdown API in plugin settings,
you should set personal access token of your github account
since Github restricts API request without access token to 60 req/hour.

You don't have to grant any permission to the personal access token.

Personal access token can be generated by a link on header on github page.
Navigate to "Settings" -> "Developer settings" -> "Personal access tokens".

Personal access token

Personal access token is only used to raise Github Markdown API rate limit,
and not used any other purpose.
You can check how this plugin use your access token at
https://github.com/Hinaser/gfm-advanced/blob/master/src/main/java/com/github/hinaser/gfma/markdown/GithubAPIMarkdownParser.java
